template.name: (None)
template.description: Do not display the attachment or any properties for the file.

template.name: Attachment with Icon
template.description: Attach the selected item and display it with an icon and its file name.

template.name: Attachment with Icon and Properties
template.description: Attach the selected item and display it with an icon, its file name and its SharePoint library file properties.

template.name: (None)
template.description: Do not display the image or any properties for the file.

template.name: Inline Image
template.description: Display the selected image item inline.

template.name: Inline Image with Properties
template.description: Display the selected image item inline along with its SharePoint library file properties.

template.name: Employee Profiles
template.description: Displays the employee profile in line.

template.name: (None)
template.description: Do not display the content of the document inline

template.name: Case Study Microsoft Office InfoPath forms
template.description: Display the content of a Case Study Microsoft Office InfoPath form inline.

template.name: Microsoft Office WordML documents
template.description: Display the content of a Microsoft Office WordML document inline.
